content:
Seattle in May is a great idea! The weather is usually lovely that time of year.

I'd be happy to help you find the best flights from Chicago to Seattle on American Airlines to help you rack up those miles.

To get started, can you please provide me with some more information?

1. Which Chicago airport do you prefer to fly out of: O'Hare (ORD) or Midway (MDW)?
2. What are your travel dates in May? Are you flexible with your travel days or do you have specific dates in mind?
3. What's your preferred flight schedule: morning, afternoon, or evening departures?
4. Are you willing to consider connecting flights or do you only want non-stop options?
5. Do you have any specific fare classes in mind (e.g., economy, premium economy, business/first class)?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with some personalized flight options and help you maximize your American Airlines miles earnings.
